⚡ Superior conductivity for progress! 

The new 20-hi mill for Hung You Copper, part of Prosperity Tieh Enterprise, will soon roll thin strip and foil in Kaohsiung, Taiwan 📍 

📈 With speeds up to 800 m/min and coils up to 15 tons, the core Danieli Fröhling equipment will be manufactured, assembled, and tested at Danieli HQ workshops. 

💡 Did you know? Copper was probably the first metal mined and crafted by humans over 10,000 years ago. It's come a long way since then! 

The mill is scheduled to start operation in Q3 2026. Learn more in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗 
 
#danieli #hungyoucopper #prosperitytiehgroup #danielifroehling #copper #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Pipe up for big news! 🔔 
 
🤝 Hengyang Valin Steel Pipe has awarded Danieli a major contract for the world’s largest retained mandrel seamless pipe plant. 
 
🚀 Powered by Danieli FQM technology, the Hengyang facility will produce 800,000 tpy of extra-large seamless pipes (323.8 to 610 mm dia., up to 65 mm wall thickness) for energy & infrastructure.
 
Commissioning is expected in summer 2026. Discover more in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #danielicentrotube #danieliautomation #hengyangvalinsteelpipe #seamlesspipe #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

You're the Q-ONE that I want! ⚡ 
Just 28 days after startup, Shinkansai Steel has released the Final Acceptance Certificate (FAC) for its new Q-ONE power feeder in Osaka, Japan 📍

✅ Q-ONE means highly efficient EAF melting, 8% energy savings, and negligible impact on the power grid.

💡 Did you know? Developed by Danieli Automation, this is Japan’s second Q-ONE installation, following Tokyo Steel in Kyushu in 2021. And that's not all—two more installations are coming soon at Chiyoda Steel in Tokyo and JFE B&S in Himeji!

Read our electrifying press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #danieliautomation #shinkansai #EAF #QONE #electricsteelmaking #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

💡 Ever wondered how we manage over 15,000 items, transforming, assembling, and shipping products to more than 350 customers across 70+ countries?
 
🎬 Discover how the Danieli Engineering & Service hub in Völkermarkt, Austria, makes it happen.
 
Watch the full video, LINK IN BIO 🔗

Breaking the mold 🔥
 
Yukun Iron and Steel Group casts record 145-mm thick slabs at its QSP-DUE plant in Yunnan, China 📍
 
🌏 Did you know? With two casting strands (one featuring endless casting-rolling) and a production capacity exceeding 4.5 Mtpy, Yukun is the highest-performing direct casting-rolling plant in the world.
 
Ready to roll? Get the full story, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #yukun #yukuniron&steel #QSPDUE #hotrolling #endless #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

🌱 Steel is getting greener
 
Acciaierie Venete has choosen the Danieli Fastarc EAF 2020 to replace the existing one, to produce competitive and high-quality green engineering steels.
 
🌟 The new EAF will produce around 750.000 ton of finished products with consistent reduction of CO2 emissions.
 
💡 By integrating state-of-the-art technology from Danieli, Acciaierie Venete plans to slash operational expenses while upholding their high standards of steel quality and competitiveness.

Discover the details in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #acciaierievenete #EAF #greenengineering #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

20 years strong… Now better than ever 🌟 

Acerbrag’s fast-finishing block gets a well-deserved overhaul by Danieli Service after two decades of operation at its wirerod mill in Bragado, Argentina 📍 

🛠️ The machine was meticulously removed, refurbished, and revived, ensuring every detail, from gear replacements to vibrational checks, was addressed with precision and teamwork. 

Check out the full story, LINK IN BIO 🔗 

#danieli #danieliservice #acerbrag #revamp #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Feralpi Stahl sets a new production record at its “Walzwerk A” bar and wirerod mill in Riesa, Germany 📍
 
🔥 With an average output of 180 tph and a peak of 190 tph in hot-charge mode, this top performance is powered by advanced billet welding and hot-charging solutions from Danieli.
 
The main ingredients:
✔ 1994 Danieli bar and wirerod mill
✔ 2022 Danieli billet welder
✔ 2024 Danieli hot-charge equipment
 …And Feralpi Stahl’s unwavering trust in Danieli innovation! 🤝
 
Read the full press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #feralpistahl #topperformance #bar #wirerod #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Danieli technology sets sail! 🚢
 
This week at Porto Nogaro, Italy, we loaded nearly 5,000 tons of advanced Danieli equipment destined for Nucor’s state-of-the-art complex in West Virginia, USA 📍
 
⭐ This important shipment features our patented Danieli Universal Endless (DUE) technology: three rolling modes in one line for flexible and efficient slab casting-rolling of 1-24mm strip, all within a single, compact layout.
 
🌎 Wishing our technology a safe voyage to its new home and many productive, green, and efficient years ahead!

#danieli #nucor #QSPDUE #DUE #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Keeping it cool ❄ JSPL selects Danieli’s new-generation Exstream II Direct Quench (DQ) system for its Steckel mill in Raigarh, India 📍 

🌊 What’s new? The Exstream II cooling system enables flexible production of a wide range of high-value products, while reducing alloy consumption for improved weldability. 

💡 This upgrade follows a major Steckel mill revamp by Danieli, including automation, power downcoilers, ACC systems, and more! 

Discover more in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗 

#danieli #JSPL #quenching #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

💡 What defines an award-winning product?
 
💬 Watch our exclusive interview with Mr. Nakamura Tsuyoshi, former director of Topy Industries, Ltd., as he shares expert insights on coil and spool solutions, the Japanese market, and storage and handling optimization.
 
🏆 Powered by Danieli innovation, Topy Steel’s TACoil compact coil earned its place among the top 100 designs at the 2019 Good Design Awards.
 
🎬 Discover the technology that brought the vision to life. Watch the full interview now, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #topysteel #spool #coil #interview #youtube #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Success is always better when shared! ⭐
 
✨ We’re proud to announce that Danieli has once again been certified as a Top Employer for 2025 by the Top Employers Institute!
 
💡 What's our secret? A commitment to collaboration, innovation, and an incredible team that makes it all possible. 
 
🏆 Here’s to another year of building an inclusive, inspiring workplace where everyone can thrive!
 
#danieli #topemployer #topemployer2025 #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Lucky number seven! 🎰 
 
Shougang Jingtang United I&S has successfully rolled hot-rolled strip down to 0.7 mm at its QSP-DUE plant in Tangshan, China 📍 

📈 Equipped with Danieli Universal Endless (DUE) technology, the plant—designed for thicknesses between 0.8–12.7 mm—has exceeded design expectations. 

💡 Did you know? Shougang Jingtang was the first to trust in QSP-DUE innovation: three operational modes and unparalleled production flexibility. 

How’s that for a groundbreaking first? Find out more in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗 

#danieli #SGJT #shougangjingtang #QSPDUE #hotrolling #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Straight A success! 📏 Acciaierie Venete selects Danieli for a second SBQ bar straightening line at Padova Works, Italy 📍
 
⚙ The fully automated line will process SBQ black bars up to 200 mm dia. combining high productivity with 15% energy and setup time savings.
 
🕹 Ready to integrate seamlessly with Danieli's advanced digital systems, such as the D-CMS (Danieli Conditioning Monitoring System), and fully compliant with Industry 4.0 standards.
 
🌍 Did you know? Danieli has delivered over 160 straightening lines since 1970!
 
Discover the details in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #acciaierievenete #SBQ #straightening #bars #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Let's get rolling ⚙ New Danieli shiftable roughing stands successfully startup at Nippon Steel's Kamaishi special steel plant, Japan 📍 

🔧 The tailor-made mill is designed for twist-free rolling of 130- to 168-mm billets at 130 tph, enhancing flexibility and efficiency in a compact space. 

🌟 Producing high-quality special steel wire rod, it features two mono-groove vertical and horizontal housingless stands, individually shiftable by electric actuators. 

Discover the details, LINK IN BIO 🔗 

#danieli #nipponsteel #startup #wirerod #specialsteel #rolling #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Stirring up quality! 🌀 
Posco has selected Danieli Rotelec’s Multi-Mode Electromagnetic Stirrer (MM-EMS) for slab caster #1 at Gwangyang Works, Korea 📍
 
🔄 This advanced technology replaces the existing mould equipment to produce superior-quality slabs, just like the MM-EMS already operating on caster #3 at the same plant.
 
💡 Did you know? This marks the 13th caster at Posco to adopt Danieli Rotelec’s stirring technology!
 
Discover more about this milestone in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #posco #MMEMS #danielirotelec #stirring #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

What a difference a year makes! ⭐

🏆 As 2025 approaches, we're taking a moment to celebrate the milestones that made 2024 truly unforgettable for Danieli.

🌱 This year has been packed with major orders, successful startups, and innovations that set new standards—especially in our committment to a greener, more sustainable industry!

🤝 Of course, we couldn’t have done it without our incredible team, loyal customers, and trusted partners. Thank you for being part of our journey.

Here’s to the challenges and victories that lie ahead.
Let’s make 2025 another year to remember! 🌟

#danieli #happyholidays #newyearsgreetings #2025 #yearinreview #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Safety first! 👷‍♀️ 

Sovel has partnered with Danieli Automation to modernize the electrical and automation systems of its bar mill in Almyros, Magnissia, Greece 📍
 
🕹 This upgrade will replace outdated hardware with advanced Danieli Automation systems and cutting-edge process controls, marking a significant improvement in safety, process stability, and production reliability.
 
For more details, read our full press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #danieliautomation #sovel #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Wrapping up the year with some holiday cheer! 🎁
 
⭐ This year’s Xmas event once again brought together Danieli employees and their families for a day of creativity, discovery, and celebration of excellence.

🏆 From exploring the heart of our company during the open days to unveiling this year’s awards, we celebrated the values and dedication that define us.

🤝 A heartfelt thank you to everyone who joined—whether in person or virtually—for making this event so memorable.

🎥 Check out our video for a glimpse of our holiday spirit!

#danieli #xmas #xmas2024 #danielixmas #happyholidays #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Nothing is impossible! 🏆 

Tata Steel awarded Danieli Service the “Most Innovative Partner Award” for a remarkable BOF upgrade project at its Jamshedpur plant 📍
 
🔧 The challenge? Replacing the lower and upper stacks of BOF converters in a confined space—a task pending for years due to complexity and safety concerns.
 
💡 How did we do it? A perfect blend of expertise, creativity, experience, and a seamless collaboration between the Tata Steel and Danieli teams!

Discover more about our award-winning solution in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

☘ Going nuclear for green steel! 
 
newcleo and Danieli have just signed an MoU to explore nuclear-powered, eco-friendly steelmaking ☢
 
✅ By integrating newcleo’s LFR (Lead-cooled Fast Reactor) technology with Danieli’s green steel solutions, we can harness electricity and high-temperature heat to power Danieli Digimelter, produce green hydrogen for Energiron direct reduction, and drive ultra-low-carbon steel.
 
🌱 This synergy answers Europe’s call for sustainable manufacturing, aligning with the EU Commission’s Clean Industrial Deal goals.
 
The future of green steelmaking is right around the corner. Discover more in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #newcleo #nuclearenergy #mou #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

In the flat steel market, quality begins at casting! 🌟
 
📍 Discover Jindal Steel Odisha, where Danieli's state-of-the-art 3.6-Mtpy slab caster sets the standard.
 
📈 With speeds hitting 2.2 m/min and delivering advanced steel grades, we're raising the bar (and slabs!) for productivity and sustainability.
 
🎬 Embark on a virtual journey to India and explore more on our official YouTube channel. Watch now, LINK IN BIO 🔗
 
#danieli #casting #jindalsteel #youtube #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

⚡ Charging ahead! Donghua Steel has chosen two Danieli Zerobucket EAFs for its electric arc furnace project in Tangshan, Hebei province, China 📍
 
What's in store?
✔ Continuous and flexible charging of scrap, DRI, HBI, and hot metal
✔ Quick tap-to-tap times
✔ Continuous feeding of preheated scrap
✔ 10% lower power-on time and up to 50% lower power-off time
 
Start-up is set for Q2 2026. Read more in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗
 
#danieli #donghuasteel #donghuaironandsteel #EAF #electricsteelmaking #china #zerobucket #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Pickled to perfection 🌟 

Danieli Service has upgraded Lusosider Aços Planos’ pickling line #2 at Aldeia de Paio Pires, Portugal 📍 

⚙ The supply included a tailor-made Danieli outboard bearing and pay-off reel mandrel, complete with main gears and bearings, to accommodate coil expansions from 570 to 660 mm. 

Curious for more? Check out our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗 

#danieli #lusosider #upgrade #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

🔨 Breaking ground in Mojave!
 
The new Danieli MIDA Hybrid QLP-DUE is set to revolutionize green rebar production for Pacific Steel Group in California, USA 📍
 
🌞 Powered by Q-One, this state-of-the-art MIDA will transform scrap into 380,000 shtpy of straight and spooled rebar using solar energy.

🗓️ Commissioning is slated for Q1 2027. Discover the details in our press release , LINK IN BIO 🔗
 
#danieli #pacificsteelgroup #PSG #MIDA #QLPDUE #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

⚙ Casting a new era: Jindal Shadeed Iron & Steel is upgrading its casting lines in Sohar, Oman, with advanced Danieli technology.
 
What’s new?
✅ Enhanced automation and control systems, including final electromagnetic stirrers for high-precision rail-steel applications
✅ Production capabilities covering round 450 mm, round 380 mm, and 250×350 mm sections
✅ “Phased” installation from July 2025 to March 2026 to minimize downtime
 
Diversified special steel grades, higher quality, optimized efficiency. Read more in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗
 
#danieli #jindalshadeed #ccm #casting #upgrade #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

🚀 G-Steel, part of Nippon Steel, adds cold-rolling capability in eastern Thailand with a brand-new four-high skinpass mill!
 
🌟 This 720,000-tpy turnkey facility features advanced HAGC cylinders and E-Type bending blocks for ultimate gap and flatness control.
 
🛠️ Did you know? Two more Danieli skinpass mills are under construction in South-East Asia! 
 
The new plant is scheduled for start-up in Q2 2026. Find out more in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #nipponsteel #gsteel #coldrolling #skinpassmill #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

China’s largest BF is back on stream with Danieli Corus plate cooling technology! 🔥 
 
🌡 Jiangsu Shagang Group’s 5800 m³ furnace #4, the biggest in the nation, roared back to life at  Zhangjiagang plant, in the Lo Jiangsu province, China after just four months of #modernization. 
 
❄ The Danieli Corus conversion, featuring copper plate coolers and a level 2 heat-loss monitoring system, ensures safer, more efficient operation.
 
Extended campaign life, improved furnace integrity, and more. Read all about it in our press release , LINK IN BIO 🔗
 
#danieli #shaganggroup #danielicorus #BF #modernization #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

💬 Achieving the perfect balance of productivity, flexibility, and production costs is the key to success!
 
📅 In 2016, voestalpine’s rolling mill supplied by Danieli rolled its first billet.
 
✨ Today, it delivers over 400 different special steel grades for demanding applications in mobility, energy, and mechanical engineering.
 
🎤 In our latest video, Gunter Korp, voestalpine Wire Rod Austria Managing Director, explains how Danieli solutions take your products to the next level. 
 
🎬 Watch now on our official YouTube channel, LINK IN BIO 🔗
 
#danieli #voestalpine #interview #youtube #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies

The success of a "joint" effort 🤝 

⚙️ Oman Aluminum Rolling Company (OARC) is boosting its non-reversing aluminium cold rolling mill in Sohar with brand-new DanJoint gear-type spindles. 

These oil-lubricated spindles by Danieli Service feature: 
✅ Upgraded design 
✅ Enhanced materials 
✅ A lubrication unit that feeds both spindles and gearbox simultaneously 

🔧 The brand new spindles are fully interchangeable and compatible with the original equipment. 

Better performance and durability roll hand in hand! Discover more in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗 

#danieli #OARC #omanaluminiumrollingcompany #danjoint #service #spindles #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Raising the bar (in coil) 📈
 
Fagersta Stainless (part of the Marcegaglia Group) is gearing up for a brand-new Danieli bar-in-coil line in Fagersta, Sweden 📍
 
🔧 Rolling 8.5 and 8.8-mm diameters into 1-ton coils at 35 tph, the line will produce rounds, squares, and hexagons—powered by two new Morgårdshammar housingless stands for maximum flexibility.
 
Hot startup slated for Q1 2026. Discover the details in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗
 
#danieli #marcegaglia #fagersta #barincoil #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

We explored: 
🌱 Competitive digital green steelmaking
💡 Cutting-edge advancements in digitalization and AI
💬 Firsthand accounts of how MIDA transformed our customers’ businesses
…And so much more!

Yukun Iron and Steel is raising the bar with Danieli QSP-DUE in China! 🏆
 
✅ Endless rolling delivering coils with excellent surface quality, precise geometry, and uniform microstructure
✅ Casting records on the Danieli-patented DySen caster, regularly producing 145-mm-thick slabs
✅ 4.5-Mtpy capacity, making it the world’s highest-producing direct casting-rolling plant
 
💡 Did you know? This line (designed for 0.8 to 25-mm strip in various steel grades) incorporates more than 50 Danieli patents!
 
Discover the details in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗
 
#danieli #yukun #yukunironandsteel #QSPDUE #endlesscastingrolling #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

🎱 Eight is the magic number!
 
Alfa Acciai invests in Danieli spooler line to scale coil weight from 3 to 8 tons at its Brescia works in northern Italy 📍
 
⚙️ This upgraded solution ensures torsion-free bar spooling for diameters from 8 up to 16 mm, with future potential for 18 and 20 mm.
 
🏆 Danieli K-Spool technology does it again: proven in 42 installations worldwide to achieve superior yield, process stability, and final product quality.
 
The hot start-up is set for early 2026. Discover more in our press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗
 
#danieli #alfaacciai #spooler #kspool #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

💧 Yes, filter!
 
⏩ Operating the world’s fastest aluminium cold strip mill (2200 m/min), Logan just commissioned a second 12,000 L/min DanPurity pressure‑plate filter.
 
🌀 Twin‑filter layout means zero unscheduled pauses, pristine coolant, and flawless can‑stock quality for Cold Mill #4.
 
🌏 Beyond aluminium: Taiwan’s F‑Magnesium is now also operating a DanPurity filter on its Fröhling four‑hi mill for premium copper‑alloy strip.
 
Want crystal‑clear details? Find our press release in the LINK IN BIO 🔗

Success in full bloom 🌻

✨ This second recent deal between Fagersta Stainless (part of the Marcegaglia Group) and Danieli will supercharge the historic Swedish facility with 70,000 tpy capacity for premium Inconel and SuperDuplex bars from 35 to 220 mm dia. 

✅ The flexible layout features multiple rolling paths, including a modernized breakdown mill originally from 1943, plus new reversing stands, in-line quenching, and finishing area.

⚙️ Lean, mean, shredding machine!
 
NSL Green Steel Recycling, a subsidiary of JSW Steel, recently ordered a heavy-duty shredder for Khalapur, Maharashtra, India 📍
 
♻️ This shredder chews mixed ferrous scrap, cars and bales at >100 tph, delivering high-density proler ready for melting at JSW works.
 
⚡ A Danieli-patented variable-speed inverter drives higher torque, lower kWh/ton, zero productivity sacrifice.
 
Danieli Centro Recycling really does it all! Discover the details in our full press release, LINK IN BIO 🔗

Drumroll, please 🥁 Marienhütte has selected Danieli to revamp the finishing area of its bar line in Graz, Austria 📍
 
⭐ The project features the newly-patented Twin Drum system, delivering bars from 8 to 40 mm in diameter into the cooling bed at speeds up to 60 m/sec.
 
🕹 Fully automated, this upgrade will increase production flexibility, enhance operator safety, and reduce operating costs.
 
🏆 Did you know? Twin Drum is the 120th technology solution patented by Danieli for long product rolling.
 
Start-up is scheduled for early 2026. Read the full story, LINK IN BIO 🔗

#danieli #marienhutte #longproducts #twindrum #steelmaking #steelmill #metallurgy #innovativetechnologies #danieliteam #greensteel #greenmetal

Designed for ultimate operator comfort and precision, the LINDEMANN shredder cabin sets the standard for modern recycling equipment.

🇮🇳 India’s Steel Ambitions: A Call for Action in Metal Recycling♻️

By 2030, India aims to achieve an impressive 250 million tones of steel output, a critical milestone for its industrial and economic growth. But this ambitious target comes with a significant challenge: 700 shredder plants will be required to process the necessary scrap materials, supported by 2,800-3,000 collection and dismantling centers.(Source: Euromonitor, SIAM, Business Sweden Analysis)

This is a tremendous opportunity for the recycling industry to step up and play a pivotal role in building a more efficient and sustainable supply chain.

At LINDEMANN, we are committed to driving innovation and delivering advanced solutions that empower businesses to meet these demands. With our cutting-edge shredders and expertise in metal recycling, we’re ready to support India—and the world—on its journey to a more circular economy.

Let’s shape the future of recycling together. 🌟

Spotlight on Düsseldorf: Home of LINDEMANN Headquarters 🌟🇩🇪

At the heart of LINDEMANN's global operations lies our headquarters in the vibrant city of Düsseldorf, state capital of NRW (Germany). We have 142 dedicated professionals working at this location, driving innovation, providing outstanding customer service, and contributing to the success of the global recycling industry. Düsseldorf is also home to one of our state-of-the-art service centers, ensuring our customers receive the expert support and technical solutions they need to succeed. 

📍 What else is Düsseldorf famous for? 

Located on the banks of the Rhine River, Düsseldorf is a city that seamlessly blends tradition and innovation. Here are some quick facts about our home city:

🌆 The MedienHafen in Düsseldorf is a vibrant hub of modern architecture, culture, and business, nestled along the Rhine River. Once a bustling industrial port, this area has transformed into a trendy district, showcasing iconic designs by renowned architects like Frank Gehry and David Chipperfield. MedienHafen is home to creative agencies, media companies, and upscale restaurants, offering a perfect blend of innovation and lifestyle. 

🎭 Culture & Arts: The city boasts a thriving arts scene, with institutions like the Kunstsammlung NRW and the Deutsche Oper am Rhein.

🍻 Famous for Altbier: No visit to Düsseldorf is complete without sampling its iconic local brew, Altbier, served in the city's historic Altstadt.

🌳 Green Spaces: With its many parks and gardens, including the stunning Rheinpark, Düsseldorf offers plenty of spots to relax and recharge.

We’re proud to call this dynamic city our home and look forward to continuing to innovate and serve our customers from our Düsseldorf HQ.

🍪✨ Cookie Monster’s Post-Christmas Recycling Craze ✨🍪

Christmas may be over, but Cookie Monster? It’s still in full holiday mode – with cookies galore! 🎄🍪 Leftover treats are piled high, and while munching is still its favorite pastime, this year Cookie Monster had a new idea: Why not recycle those leftover cookies into something creative? 🧑‍🍳✨

At LINDEMANN, we understand the power of recycling. While Cookie Monster reimagines cookies, we focus on reimagining metals. With our innovative shredders, balers, and shears, we make metal recycling efficient, sustainable, and future-ready. ⚙️🌍

Take a moment to relax, recharge, and enjoy the final days of this year – with a touch of creativity and sustainability. Wishing you restful and joyful moments from all of us at LINDEMANN! 🎄💙

🌍 Global Scrap Consumption on the Rise ♻️

By 2030, global demand for steel scrap is projected to hit 778 million tons, marking a 15.1% increase compared to 2021, according to the POSCO Research Institute, as reported by S&P Global.

This growth underscores a clear trend: the world is not only consuming more scrap but also demanding higher-quality raw materials. As the steel industry moves toward sustainable practices, electric arc furnaces are becoming central to expansion plans, while countries like China are raising the bar on quality standards for imported materials.

Looking further ahead, scrap demand is expected to reach 964 million tons by 2050 – a milestone aligned with global steel producers‘ ambitions for carbon neutrality.

At LINDEMANN Metal Recycling, we are proud to support this transformation of the circular economy by delivering innovative solutions that ensure a sustainable and efficient use of resources for a better tomorrow.

Steel’s green future is being forged with scrap. Are we ready to meet the challenge? 💪✨

#MetalRecycling #MetalRecyclingSolutions #RecycleForChange #RecycleResponsibly #GreenFuture #RecycleForABetterFuture #Steel

♻️ The future of steel is circular.

Today, around 30% of steel is produced using recycled scrap. By 2050, this share is expected to rise to 50%—a major shift toward a more resource-efficient and lower-emission industry.

At LINDEMANN, we are proud to provide the technology that powers this transformation. Our high-performance shredders and shears help the industry recover more material, optimize processing, and meet the growing demand for recycled steel.

Steel’s strength lies not just in its durability but in its infinite recyclability. Let's shape a cleaner future together.🌱

Source: ING Think: Why ferrous scrap is emerging as a key strategic raw material

🌍 Why Metal Recycling Matters 🌍

Did you know that recycling metals can save up to 95% of the energy needed to produce new metal? 🌱💡 At LINDEMANN Metal Recycling, we’re proud to contribute to a more sustainable future by reducing CO2 emissions and conserving valuable natural resources — every single day.

Why is metal recycling so important?
✔️ Energy Savings: Recycling metals uses far less energy than producing new ones.
✔️ Lower CO2 Emissions: Less energy-intensive processes reduce carbon emissions.
✔️ Resource Conservation: Recycling helps preserve finite resources like steel, aluminum, and copper.

At LINDEMANN, we’re committed to making the most out of every material, turning waste into valuable resources, and contributing to a cleaner, greener planet. 
Together, we can make a difference! 🌱

🌍 Driving the Green Steel Cycle with LINDEMANN ♻️

The steel industry is stepping up by replacing old blast furnaces with electric arc furnaces, slashing CO2 by up to 80%.

All LINDEMANN machines are equipped with the quality and technology required for steel processing in compliance with the green steel cycle. From the material preparation of the scrap, separation of the fractions and the proven reduction of emissions right up to the result analysis which evaluates the purity level of the processed material: LINDEMANN is committed to the green steel cycle.

Instead of discarding components at the end of their ‘first life’, we refurbish them to as-new condition. This ‘second life’ conserves raw materials, while the process requires only a fraction of the energy needed to manufacturing components from scratch. 

We are also working to reduce indirect emissions that occur along our value chain, by selecting suppliers that share our environmental goals. 

At LINDEMANN, we’re fueling the green transformation. Solutions like our 400 bar hydraulic technology, Variable Frequency Drive (VFD), and Shredder Drive Assistant (SDA), are designed to make recycling smarter, cleaner, and more efficient. We’re reducing emissions, optimizing energy use, and giving scrap a new life in the steel cycle.

The future of steel is green – and it’s happening now. 🔄💚

#GreenSteel #Sustainability #CircularEconomy #Recycling #LINDEMANN #ClimateAction #EcoEfficiency

Meet the LINDEMANN EtaPress: The Fastest Scrap Baler in the World

When every second counts, the EtaPress delivers. Engineered for maximum speed, reliability, and performance, it compresses metal scrap into high-density bales every 26 seconds – making it the fastest triple-action baler on the market.
But speed is just the beginning.

From compact punching scrap to cables, wires, and mixed materials, the EtaPress handles it all with unmatched precision and power. Thanks to its intelligent triple-compaction system (horizontal, vertical, side), you get superior bale density and optimal weight – all with throughput rates of up to 59 tons per hour.

🔧 Built for 24/7 industrial use
🔍 Intelligent control system for lower energy use and better cycle times
💡 Modular setup with optional water injection, weighing, and feed automation
⚙️ Powerful hydraulics for high force, minimal oil usage, and reduced wear
🛠️ Designed for quick servicing with accessible maintenance points
💬 Did you know? Four EtaPress balers power Audi’s fully automated stamping waste recycling system – Europe’s largest.

From installation to integration, the EtaPress is more than a machine. It’s a productivity multiplier for the future of scrap processing.

From Düsseldorf to Texas – A Legacy Forged in Steel
It all began in 1913, when LINDEMANN launched its first baler press in Düsseldorf. What followed was more than a century of innovation, engineering excellence, and a growing global footprint.
One of the defining milestones came in 1958, when LINDEMANN delivered the world’s first hydraulically operated scrap shear – a 1,200-ton powerhouse – to Luria Brothers, then the largest scrap company in the United States.
Developed in cooperation with Lake Erie, a hydraulics company based in Buffalo, this groundbreaking machine marked the beginning of the hydraulic scrap shear era in North America. Many more followed, helping shape an entire industry.
Fast forward to the early 1980s, when the next chapter began:
The story of Texas Shredder took off in San Antonio, Texas, starting with spare parts and consumables for shredders. By 1986, the first Texas Shredder was delivered to Southern Iron & Metal in Beaumont, TX.
Since then, nearly 120 shredders have been built and installed—most of them in North America—solidifying the Texas Shredder name as a symbol of heavy-duty reliability.
Today, that legacy continues in products like the TXS 69x90 modular shredder, combining decades of proven experience with the smart performance needed for tomorrow’s scrap processing.
From Düsseldorf to Texas – and far beyond – LINDEMANN continues to shape the future of metal recycling with deep roots, bold ideas, and strong customer partnerships.
🌍 Global roots. Local impact. Timeless engineering.

Did you know? 🔄
Europe’s steel industry is undergoing a circular transformation – and scrap metal is now considered a strategic resource.

According to the 2024 paper “Circular Transformation of the European Steel Industry Renders Scrap Metal a Strategic Resource” by Peter Klimek, Maximilian Hess, Markus Gerschberger, and Stefan Thurner, the shift toward electric arc furnaces (EAFs) is key to reducing CO₂ emissions in steel production. 

But this change comes with big implications:
🔧 Up to 730 new scrap processing companies needed
📈 Around 35,000 new jobs expected
💶 An estimated $35 billion in new market turnover
🌍 A complete restructuring of the European scrap supply chain

📚 Read the full study here: arxiv.org/abs/2406.12098

At LINDEMANN, we’ve always known: scrap isn’t waste – it’s the raw material of the future.
With our shredders, shears, and balers, we’re helping recyclers power the circular economy and feed the future of green steel.
♻️ When the world goes circular, LINDEMANN keeps it moving.
#DidYouKnow #CircularEconomy #GreenSteel #ScrapMetal #StrategicResource #LINDEMANN #MetalRecycling #ShredCutPressWin #RecyclingInnovation #SteelTransformation

Hej från Trelleborg 🇸🇪 – LINDEMANN’s Home in Southern Sweden
Welcome to Trelleborg, Sweden’s southernmost city and the Scandinavian base for LINDEMANN’s recycling expertise.
This coastal hub isn’t just famous for its ferry port or charming old town – it’s also where German engineering meets Swedish reliability. From here, our team supports customers across Scandinavia with expert service, spare parts, and technical consulting for LINDEMANN shredders, balers, and shears.
🧭 Why Trelleborg?
Its strategic location at the heart of Nordic logistics makes it the perfect base for fast support and strong customer relationships in Sweden, Denmark, and beyond.
Trelleborg is also a place full of history, character, and seaside charm.
🌍 Did you know?
Trelleborg gets its name from a Viking ring fortress – and you can still visit the reconstructed Trelleborgen, a circular fort from around 980 AD, right in the middle of the city! It's one of the few Viking fortresses in Sweden and a must-see for history lovers.
🚢 Gateway to Europe
Trelleborg is Sweden’s largest ferry port, connecting Scandinavia with Germany and Poland. Over 10 ferries leave daily — making it a true crossroads of trade, travel, and culture.
🧑‍🔧 Modern Industry Meets Local Life
From wind turbines to recycling technology, Trelleborg is home to a diverse industrial landscape. At LINDEMANN’s branch office here, our team supports customers across the Nordic region with technical service, spare parts, and project support.
🌊 What to See
• Stroll along Strandgatan, the beachside promenade
• Visit Trelleborgs Museum for Viking artifacts and local art
• Snap a photo at “Smygehuk”, Sweden’s southernmost point
• Enjoy fika (Swedish coffee break!) at a cozy café in the city center
💬 Our team around Steven Groeneweg in Trelleborg combines local know-how with global experience to help recyclers across Scandinavia get the most out of their LINDEMANN equipment.

Not all scrap is created equal — and not every machine can handle it.
Enter the LINDEMANN EtaCut II: our powerful side compression shear, built for the toughest, bulkiest, and most varied materials in the yard.
Whether you’re processing heavy mixed scrap, car bodies, aluminum alloys, or military-grade materials, the EtaCut II delivers unmatched flexibility and cutting force — up to 1,600 tons. It compresses and shears even oversized scrap with precision, reliability, and speed.

• Aluminum castings & wrought alloys

• Heavy & light mixed scrap
• Demolition scrap & structure steel
• Military vehicles, shipwreck scrap, railroad cars
• Containers, tanks, sheet piling & radiators
• Reinforcing steel, skeleton scrap & wire ropes
If it’s big, heavy, awkwardly shaped, or hard to cut — the EtaCut II was made for it.

From scrapyards to steel mills, EtaCut II helps recyclers turn chaos into order — with dense, clean-cut scrap that’s ready for its next life.

TXS 69x90: Comeback of a Legend

Introducing the next generation of metal shredding: the TXS 69x90. As the powerful successor to the legendary Texas Shredder, this new modular system is built to meet today’s highest demands for throughput, availability, and efficiency in metal recycling.

With drive power up to 2,500 HP and throughput capabilities of over 50 tons per hour, the TXS 69x90 is designed for serious performance. Its heavy-duty construction, reinforced housing, and optimized feed system ensure long-term reliability—even under the harshest operating conditions.
But what really sets it apart? Flexibility. The TXS can be combined with a modular separation system to create a compact, high-efficiency plant tailored to your space and material needs—whether you’re working with mixed scrap, ELVs, or heavy metal.

💡 Highlights: • Dual hydraulic feed rolls for smooth, controlled material input
• Intelligent water injection system to reduce dust and emissions
• Optional downstream sorting: overbelt magnets, eddy current separators, and more
• Designed for easy service access and reduced downtime
• Ideal for operators who demand more from their shredder
Available now in North America!

🔧 It’s not just a shredder. It’s a LINDEMANN.

Did you know? Aluminum is a true recycling champion.
But not all aluminum is the same – there are over 20 different grades of aluminum scrap. The demand for aluminum scrap in the EU will increase to 9 million tons in the next few decades (demand for aluminum by 50%) 

Why Aluminium:

♻️ Aluminum is infinitely recyclable – without losing quality.
🔁 75% of all aluminum ever produced is still in use today.
⚡ Using aluminum scrap instead of primary aluminum saves 95% of the energy.
💡 That’s up to 14,000 kWh saved per ton of recycled aluminum.
⚠️ Producing 1 ton of primary aluminum requires around 13.5 MWh of electricity.
✅ Recycling needs just 0.67 MWh – only 5% of the energy.
🌱 The environmental impact? Aluminum scrap reduces CO₂ emissions by 92% compared to primary production.
📊 Globally, the production of secondary aluminum is now twice as high as that of primary aluminum.
✅ The result:
Aluminum scrap is no longer just waste – it’s the most important raw material for aluminum production.
At LINDEMANN, we build machines that make this possible.
Efficient. Precise. Designed for the future.

With some units still running strong after 30+ years, the 4200 has proven it can outwork, outlast, and outproduce other balers/loggers in its class.

Built for speed, the 4200 quickly produces 24x20xVariable bales thanks to:

- Curved doors for easy loading of bulky material
- Short-stroke rams that reduce cycle times
- Fully automated baling, logging, and eject functions

When it comes to leading with integrity, mentoring with intention, and showing up for others, Sergio sets the standard.

Meet Sergio, our Director of Health & Safety, with a vast background of experience in environmental health, EMT response, and search and rescue to every corner of our operation. But it’s his character that makes the biggest impact.

Honest. Knowledgeable. Caring. Motivating. Sergio inspires those around him to grow individually while keeping the entire team focused on shared goals.

Outside of work, he continues to serve the community through Kern Valley Search and Rescue and as co-founder of Hold The Line Fly Fishing, a nonprofit supporting mental health and wellness through time on the water.

We’re beyond lucky to have him on our team, thank you for all that you do Sergio!

Bugün, 6 Şubat depreminin yıl dönümünde, hayatını kaybeden vatandaşlarımızı saygı ve rahmetle anıyor, ailelerine sabır ve dayanma gücü diliyoruz. Bu büyük felaketin acısını yüreğimizde hissederken, dayanışma ve birlik içinde olmanın önemini bir kez daha hatırlıyoruz.

Deprem gerçeğiyle yüzleşmek ve gerekli önlemleri almak, gelecekte benzer acıların yaşanmaması için hayati bir sorumluluktur. Daha güvenli yarınlar için bilinçlenmeye, afetlere karşı hazırlıklı olmaya ve gerekli tedbirleri almaya devam etmeliyiz.

Bugün, sadece kaybettiklerimizi anma günü değil, aynı zamanda ders çıkarıp daha güvenli bir gelecek inşa etme sorumluluğunu hatırlama günüdür.

———————————————————————

Today marks the anniversary of the February 6 earthquake, and

Today marks the anniversary of the February 6 earthquake, and we remember with respect and compassion those who lost their lives. We extend our deepest condolences to their families and wish them strength and resilience. The pain of this great disaster remains in our hearts, reminding us once again of the importance of unity and solidarity.

Facing the reality of earthquakes and taking necessary precautions is crucial to preventing similar tragedies in the future. We must continue to raise awareness, be prepared for disasters, and take the necessary measures to ensure a safer tomorrow.

Today is not only a day of remembrance for those we lost but also a day to reflect, learn, and commit to building a safer future.

As part of our ongoing commitment to innovation, Aymas has consistently delivered top-quality and technologically advanced solutions over the years. One significant improvement introduced six years ago is the use of HUNGER brand seal housings in our guided guillotine shearing systems. This enhancement effectively prevents scratches caused by gaps between the shearing blades. As a result, we have statistically increased the operational lifespan of our cylinders by 140%.

Power. Precision. Performance.

Meet the AYMAS Shear Baler — engineered for the toughest challenges in metal recycling.

With cutting forces up to 1350 tons and a capacity reaching 40 tons/hour, this machine is built to process HMS 1 & 2, end-of-life vehicles, pipes, and more — all without an operator.

From sensitive cut length adjustment to remote diagnostics, every feature is designed for efficiency, safety, and durability. Available in electric or diesel, stationary or semi-mobile options — it adapts to your operation, not the other way around.

Chrome-plated shafts, anti-wear plates, and top-tier components ensure reliable, long-term performance even under extreme conditions.

Built strong. Runs smart. Cuts clean.

Engineered for precision. Built for performance.
The AYMAS Single Shaft Shredder is the ideal solution for uniform shredding of plastics, paper, and packaging materials.

With high-torque electric-hydraulic power and customizable blades, it delivers clean output, low energy consumption, and seamless integration into recycling lines.

✅ Motor Power: up to 640 kW
✅ Blade Sizes: 105x105 mm & 150x150 mm
✅ Rotor Speed: 20–30 rpm
✅ User-friendly interface & easy maintenance
✅ Safety-first design with smart controls

From flexible material handling to sustainable processing — this shredder adapts to your needs while protecting the environment.

🌍 Job Opening: Technical Sales Specialist – Europe (Remote)

Company: Aymas Recycling Machinery
Industry: Scrap Processing Machinery Manufacturing
Location: Remote (based in Europe) | Head Office: İzmir, Turkey
Employment Type: Full-Time
Travel: Required across Europe

About Us:
Aymas Recycling Machinery is a global manufacturer of high-quality scrap processing machines, including scrap shears, shear balers, shredders, briquetting presses, and turnkey recycling systems. With a strong presence in over 45 countries and a reputation for robust engineering, we are now expanding our team in Europe.

Position Summary:

 We are seeking a motivated and technically skilled Technical Sales Specialist to represent our brand in the European market. This is a remote position, ideally suited for a self-driven individual who thrives in technical B2B sales environments.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and maintain relationships with customers across Europe
Prepare technical and commercial offers tailored to client needs
Conduct client visits and site assessments
Represent Aymas at trade fairs, exhibitions, and industry events
Provide after-sales support in coordination with HQ and service teams
Report market feedback and trends to the management team

Qualifications:

Prior experience in sales of metal scrap processing machinery (preferred)
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Willingness to travel across Europe
Fluent in English; additional European languages are a plus
Self-motivated and able to work independently

Interested?
 If this sounds like your next career move, drop us a message and tell us a bit about yourself. We’d love to hear from you!

Shear, baby, shear #aluminum #aluminium #recycling

🇬🇧 Jebb Metals have now put to work their new Koloss 1000 TS. This Lefort shear/baler is proving to be a real head turner as it sits proudly at the top of their yard. 

💥 Delivered to site in three main pieces the machine is assembled on a foundation frame and commissioned within two weeks. The machine is very productive on all grades of ferrous and non-ferrous metals, shearing with the 1000T window crosshead or baling with the 180T baling ram. 

💪🏽 The power, strength and speed of its cutting is giving very pleasing results for its new owners. This machine, fitted with the 600HP Scania diesel engine, operators control cabin and tunnel pusher ram is easily capable of 25-30 Tonnes per hour of production, depending upon material and cut length. 

We wish Philip & Stephen all the best for the future with their new Lefort Koloss 1000 TS 🙌

💥🎬 [𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨] bornesrecyclage  ramps-up with a new Lidex 1300T !

« Our Lidex can go up to 70t/hr. It has a rail breaker and can handle heavy scrap when needed. In the crane, thanks to the automatic cycle, our operator can prepare the next load while the scrap previously loaded is still being processed. No time is lost ! » Charles Bornes 

M. Bornes also prizes the total cooperation shown throughout the project including the recommendations for the most efficient layout of the machine on site, the supply of the civil engineering guide drawings, the logistic operations, the assembly & commissioning of the machine, not forgetting the training of operators and technicians.

🤝 Thanks again to the Bornes family for their trust.

⚙️📦 Spare Parts: A Critical Link in Industrial Efficiency 🔄

In today’s industrial landscape, performance doesn’t rely solely on the machines themselves—it depends on their ability to keep running without interruption.

That’s where spare parts come in.

➡️ Minimizing production downtime
➡️ Extending equipment lifespan
➡️ Optimizing maintenance costs
➡️ Reducing repair lead times

At LEFORT® we understand how vital this is.
That’s why we maintain a comprehensive stock of spare parts and are ready to support you—anytime, anywhere.

✅ Whether it’s urgent repair or planned maintenance, we’re here to keep your operations running smoothly !

Die International Automotive Recycling Congress (IARC) 2025 liegt hinter uns, und wir blicken auf inspirierende Tage voller spannender Gespräche, neuer Kontakte und wertvoller Impulse zurück.

📍 An Stand 14 konnten wir zeigen, wie ATM Recyclingsystems mit innovativen Recyclinglösungen die Automobilindustrie dabei unterstützt, wertvolle Materialien zurückzugewinnen, Abfälle zu reduzieren und die Kreislaufwirtschaft voranzutreiben. Der Austausch mit Branchenexperten hat einmal mehr bestätigt, wie wichtig nachhaltige Lösungen für die Zukunft sind.

Ein besonderes Highlight war die beeindruckende Ausstellung von Hans op de Beeck, die im Rahmen des Kongresses stattfand. Seine Schwarz-Weiß-Werke boten eine künstlerische Reflexion über Zeit, Raum und Vergänglichkeit – ein spannender Kontrast zu den zukunftsweisenden Themen der IARC.

Ein großes Dankeschön an alle, die uns besucht haben! Wir freuen uns schon auf die nächste Gelegenheit, gemeinsam die Zukunft zu gestalten💙#atmrecyclingssystems #IARC #Recycling #Messe

VS BIG und Förderband CB 3000 für Steinzäune
Wir freuen uns, mitteilen zu können, dass unsere VS BIG Rüttelsiebmaschine und das Förderband CB 3000 erfolgreich nach Italien geliefert wurden. Der Kunde setzt die Maschinen ein, um Steine zu sieben, die er für den Bau von Steinzäunen benötigt. Das Förderband wird dabei für den effizienten Transport der verschiedenen Fraktionen genutzt.
Die VS BIG Zweideck Testmaschine wurde erfolgreich getestet, und die Ergebnisse haben die Erwartungen des Kunden voll erfüllt. Die Maschine arbeitete zuverlässig und effizient, wobei die verschiedenen Fraktionen präzise getrennt wurden, genau wie erwartet. Der Test bestätigte die Leistungsfähigkeit der Maschine unter realen Bedingungen, und die Siebung erfolgte mit der gewünschten Effizienz und Genauigkeit.
Die VS BIG Testmaschine ist mit folgenden technischen Merkmalen ausgestattet:
• Oben deck: 130x130 mm Siebblech für grobe Fraktionen
• Untendeck: 90x90 mm Siebblech für kleinere Fraktionen
• Trennplatte für die Bildung einer dritten Fraktion
• Fixierte Metalbremse statt der herkömmlichen Gummibremse, was eine längere Haltbarkeit und bessere Leistung garantiert
• 400V Elektroanschluss für eine zuverlässige Stromversorgung
Das Förderband CB 3000 wurde mit einem fixierten Gestell unten geliefert, anstatt dem Standardgestell mit Rädern. Diese Anpassung sorgt für eine noch stabilere und effizientere Handhabung, besonders bei schwereren Materialien und längeren Transportwegen.
Wir sind stolz darauf, dass unsere Maschinen zur Qualität und Effizienz dieses spannenden Projekts beitragen und freuen uns auf die weiteren Erfolge unseres Kunden.
 
- Mehr über unseren Maschinen finden Sie hier: https://ascotec.eu/
- VS BIG & CB 3000 Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ZS-su9sozQ

Johanna hat nicht nur mit ihrer fachlichen Leistung beeindruckt, sondern auch mit ihrem außergewöhnlichen Engagement. Sie hat bereits die Englisch-Matura erfolgreich hinter sich und steht nun vor den weiteren Fächern – ein beachtlicher Erfolg!
Ihre Arbeit ist zugleich der Erfolg. Wenn etwas funktioniert, dann ist das nicht nur das Ergebnis von technischem Wissen, sondern auch von Johannas Ausdauer und Leidenschaft für ihren Beruf.
Johanna ist eine bemerkenswerte junge Frau, die es versteht, sich kontinuierlich zu verbessern, Neues zu lernen und Herausforderungen mit Begeisterung zu begegnen. Sie hat das Potenzial, eine herausragende Mechatronikerin zu werden, und wir sind überzeugt, dass sie auf dem richtigen Weg ist.
Johanna, mach weiter so! Du wirst auch die kommenden Herausforderungen mit Bravour meistern, da sind wir uns sicher!💙⚙️

Power in Action: Destroyer 1100 shear baler logger

Imagine this: this 185-ton heavy shear clamps onto a steel beam thicker than your arm and, with a deep groaning sound of metal under pressure, snaps it clean in two within seconds. Sparks fly as it effortlessly tears through reinforced structures that would take conventional tools hours to dismantle. Its sheer size, precision, and raw cutting force make it an unstoppable force in modern demolition and recycling industries.
This "Destroyer" scrap shear embodies unmatched power, turning massive metal structures into manageable scrap with a speed and efficiency that transforms heavy industry workflows.

TAURUS REDLINE BRAVO the best friend of your hammer mill!!! https://www.taurusweb.it/en/redline-preshredders-and-hammers-mills/bravo/

🔧 BRAVO: the pre-shredding solution that optimized hammer mill feeding

💥 The “Redripper BRAVO”, featuring counter-rotating horizontal shafts, is the pre-shredder specifically designed to handle bulky scrap, E.L.V., and compacted scrap bales before they enter the mill.

👉 Installed upstream of the hammer mill, it ensures homogeneous, continuous, and safe feeding.

📌 Equipped with the patented OSD OVERSTROKE tilting feed chute, BRAVO:

•	Increases productivity

•	Facilitates the intake of large and bulky materials

⚙️ Tangible benefits for metal scrap shredding and sorting plants:

• Eliminates explosion risks in the grinding chamber

• Reduces energy consumption

• Extends the lifespan of hammers, grids, and wear plates

• Prevents power surges and overloads

BRAVO boosts the performance of small and medium-sized plants, enabling them to process complex materials safely and efficiently.

📞 Want to learn more about how BRAVO can optimize your plant? Get in touch with us!  https://www.taurusweb.it/en/contact-us/

Sustainable and Cost-Efficient SENNEBOGEN Machine Transport via Water Route 🌍⚓

Our recent shipment of eight large SENNEBOGEN machines from Straubing to South Carolina via eco-friendly waterway marks another step toward sustainable logistics at SENNEBOGEN. 🍃

A total of 700 tons of machinery was loaded onto barges at the port of Straubing. 🚢 Among them were the powerful SENNEBOGEN 855 and 870 material handlers, weighing between 70 and 105 tons. The complex loading process involved precise tandem lifts, performed with a SENNEBOGEN 5500 E Crawler Crane, working in tandem with another crane.

The machines are now traveling via inland and ocean vessels to their final destination in Charleston, South Carolina. 🇺🇸 This water route cuts CO₂ emissions by 75%, saving 49 tons compared to road transport. ✅

Read more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3WvwUeZ

Restoration of historic SENNEBOGEN machines - former apprentice project with a success story 🔧
Our employees Andreas and Alois started their career at SENNEBOGEN with an extraordinary project: the restoration of historical machines for the opening of the Erich Sennebogen Museum in 2014. ✨ 
One of these machines was a SENNEBOGEN S 802 rope excavator, in production between 1958 and 1960. After so many decades, the wear and tear of time had taken a heavy toll on the machine, which had to be dismantled and painstakingly restored. Alongside other historical models, all restored to their former glory, it is a witness to the development of mechanical engineering in our company's history. 👏
Ten years after the museum opened, Andreas and Alois are still part of our team and have made impressive careers since then. 🚀
💡Read more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3Assyxo

Restaurierung historischer SENNEBOGEN Maschinen - ehemaliges Azubiprojekt mit Erfolgsgeschichte 🔧
Unsere Mitarbeiter Andreas und Alois starteten ihre Karriere bei SENNEBOGEN mit einem außergewöhnlichen Projekt: der Restaurierung historischer Maschinen zur Eröffnung des Erich Sennebogen Museums um 2014. ✨ 
Eine dieser Maschinen war ein SENNEBOGEN S 802 Seilbagger, in Produktion zwischen 1958 und 1960. Nach so vielen Jahrzehnten hatte der Zahn der Zeit stark an der Maschine genagt, welche  zerlegt und in mühevoller Detailarbeit restauriert werden musste. Im Museum in Straubing zeugt sie seit der Aufbereitung in neuer Pracht neben anderen historischen Modellen von der Entwicklung des Maschinenbaus in der Unternehmensgeschichte. 👏
Auch Andreas und Alois sind zehn Jahre nach Museumseröffnung immer noch Teil unseres Teams und haben seitdem beeindruckende Karrieren gemacht. 🚀

SENNEBOGEN Launches Green Steel Material Handler ♻️

🌍 Steel production alone is responsible for 7% of global CO₂ emissions❗

At SENNEBOGEN, we are committed to sustainability – not only through energy-efficient machine solutions, but also by using more sustainable materials. That’s why we now offer machines built with green steel – and by "green," we don’t just mean our signature color. 🟢

🍃 "Green steel" refers to CO₂-reduced, more sustainable steel production, which we can offer now in partnership with salzgitterag and its subsidiary deumu_gmbh (Deutsche Erz- und Metall-Union GmbH). Compared to conventional steel production, this enables CO₂ savings of more than 70%.

Our very first green steel machine is one of our newly launched 40 t SENNEBOGEN 830 G material handlers, a model already known for its exceptional efficiency. With green steel we are cutting up to 20 tons CO₂ emission per machine.

SENNEBOGEN now offers comprehensive implementation of this option for all models on request.
💡 Learn more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/4jcIOTT

🔜 See the first "double green" 830 G live at bauma Munich 2025, April 9-13!

Up to 14 tons of CO₂ saved per year – with the SENNEBOGEN EQ G Balancer ⚖️

At the inland port of Basel 🇨🇭, logistics expert Rhenus is setting new standards with its SENNEBOGEN G-Series EQ Balancer featuring a 30 m reach. ⚖️ Thanks to its intelligent design, the machine stays perfectly counterbalanced at all times – cutting energy consumption by up to 75%.

💪 With strong load capacity, a 30-second cycle time and energy use of just 80 kWh, this crane / handler proves: modern SENNEBOGEN Balancers are incredibly fast and efficient! 🍃 That also leads to 14 tons of CO₂ saved annually compared to conventional handlers. 

🛠️ Custom-built with an asymmetrical undercarriage to suit the port’s infrastructure: a smart engineering solution delivered with our Swiss partner kuhn_schweiz_ag.

Sustainable Waste Handling with Electric SENNEBOGEN 825 E ⚡️️️♻

At its high-tech sorting facility in Rumbeke, Belgium, Vanheede Environment Group makes an important contribution to the circular economy. Collected waste is recycled for useful applications - with the help of an all-electric SENNEBOGEN 825 E material handler, delivered by SENNEBOGEN's partner SMT Belgium.
🌱 Powered by green electricity, the electric machine can save up to 106 tons of CO₂ per year – a key step toward Vanheede’s goal of reducing emissions across all operations.

💬 “With its long service life and low maintenance costs, the 825 E is ideal for us,” says Lucas Ossieur, Fleet Manager at Vanheede.
🛡 With a pressurized cab, HEPA air filtration and bulletproof glass, the machine also protects the operator – ensuring a clean and safe working environment.

Die Mosel, mit einer Länge von 544 km der zweitlängste Nebenfluss des Rheins, spielt eine entscheidende Rolle als internationale Wasserstraße. 28 Staustufen ermöglichen den Binnenschiffen ein reibungsloses Vorankommen. 

Der Ausfall einer Schleuse, wie im Dezember 2024, stellt jedoch einen erheblichen Einschnitt im Binnenverkehr dar. Um in dieser kritischen Situation schnell und effizient zu handeln, hat das Wasserstraßen- und Schifffahrtsamt (WSA) Mosel-Saar-Lahn seit Jahren einen Rahmenvertrag mit dem Trierer Kranverleih-Experten Steil Kranarbeiten. 

Dank dieser Zusammenarbeit und modernster #Liebherr-Technik konnte das beschädigte Tor geborgen und ein neues eingebaut werden. Dazwischen spielte ein Liebherr-Mobilkran die Hauptrolle bei der Notschleusung von 74 auf der Mosel festsitzenden Schiffen.

Unsere EC-B Krane sind weltweit in Aktion, aktuell sogar in Indien 🌍

Drei #Liebherr 250 EC-B Flat-Top-Krane sind derzeit in Indien bei Cochin ISRF (International Ship Repair Facility) für Cochin Shipyard Ltd im Einsatz. 

Die Krane sind mit verschiedenen Technologien der Litronic Steuerung ausgestattet und natürlich ganz wichtig bei den heißen Temperaturen: die Klimaanlage in der Kabine. 😎

In diesem Fall wurden die EC-B Krane auf einem beweglichen Portal auf Schienen montiert, die sich über bis zu 336 m erstrecken. 🏗️ 

Ein Portal eignet sich gut, wenn der verfügbare Platz begrenzt ist. So kann der Platz z.B. als Lagerraum für Bauteile oder zur Entladung von LKWs genutzt werden.

Der Frühling ist da und wir sind bereit etwas Großartiges zu erschaffen! 🌸💛

Für ein Bauprojekt in Suriname setzte unser Kunde The Kuldipsingh Group auf das LRH 200 mit dem Hydraulikhammer H10.100 – ein Duo, das starke Leistung mit minimaler Umweltbelastung verbindet.

🦾 Quadratische Betonpfähle (400 x 400 mm) mit einer Länge bis zu 21 m und einem Gewicht von ca. 8 t wurden selbst auf engstem Raum präzise eingerammt.

✅ Der neu entwickelte Mäkler überzeugte mit einer beeindruckenden Reichweite von bis zu 8 m – und einer zusätzlichen Hubhöhe von 6 m. Auch das Absenken bis -6,5 m unter Flur war problemlos möglich.

👂 Der H10.100 arbeitete mit reduzierter Fallhöhe, um das Einrammen in Gebäudenähe erschütterungsarm und lärmreduziert (ca. 82 dBA) zu gestalten.

Und das LRH 200 kann noch mehr: Ob Impact Piling, Predrill, Soil Mixing oder Bohren – ein echtes Multitalent für den Spezialtiefbau.

Mit einer Tragkraft von 5 Tonnen im relevanten Arbeitsbereich  bei unter 26 Tonnen Gesamtgewicht hebt, versetzt und platziert der speziell entwickelte LH 22 C Industry tonnenschwere Dammbalken – zuverlässig, kraftvoll, präzise.

Perfekt in jeder Situation! 👍

Unsere Raupenbetonpumpen benötigen auf der Baustelle wenig Platz, sind schnell einsatzbereit und überall positionierbar. Egal ob sie weit oder hoch pumpen, die Ansteuerung der Pumpen erlaubt höchste Flexibilität. 

Durch das Raupenfahrwerk eignen sich die Pumpen besonders für den Baustelleneinsatz mit häufigem Wechsel der Arbeitsposition. Die Pumpen lassen sich dabei bequem über eine Funkfernbedienung manövrieren und bedienen.

Unser #Liebherr R 950 Demolition im Einsatz beim Rückbau des 100 Jahre alten Wasserturms in Denderleeuw! 🇧🇪

Mit einer Arbeitshöhe von bis zu 29 Metern und einem Betriebsgewicht von bis zu 75 Tonnen, meistert unser Raupenbagger jede Herausforderung. 

Der Einsatz wurde von unserem Kunden Hens nv und dank unserer langjährigen Partnerschaft mit Somtp Belgium erfolgreich durchgeführt. 🤝
